website_summaries.verdict: If your child already has a lot of Nerf darts but wants to try a bow and arrow model, this is a good choice.
pros: Uses regular Nerf darts, which are inexpensive and you might already have from your child's Nerf guns
Comes with a clip to hold 15 darts at once
Pull back the string to fire the darts
Young children seem to be able to handle it
cons: While this bow and arrow uses the same ammo as the Nerf guns, it doesn't generally fire as smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews but thought there couldn't be that many that arrived broken or soon to break. It makes one think that perhaps Amazon is just turning those items around and repackaging them. But this one arrived broken and my kid thinks it is a cool toy but as parents we thought something looked wrong - sure enough, and it rattles too as if something in the place that string is supposed to be attached to (inside the main grip area) has broken free. This seems like it is hit or miss with this toy so not sure how the makers of this toy ever got it out past product testing.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for kids or kids at heart.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 4 year old. He loves it - it's very easy for him to manuever it and shoot the "arrows." The only downside is finding them all afterward! It's a fun toy for kids or kids at heart as my husband and I have played with it too! Will probably look into a refill pack in a few months. Only down one so far after several days of frequent play.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and the Darts are Interchangeable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He loads up all of the darts and is able to just keep shooting them. Perhaps the best part is that the darts match many of our other dart guns so the darts are interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: C Powell

customer_reviews.title: Best Arrow Product I've found!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5yr birthday, he just loves it. Works really easy, to load and shoot. String doesn't come back to hit his arm or anything. He really liked that you could just keep shooting and not run out for a bit. It's a great addition to his nerf set and can shoot pretty far. I would definitly buy another one for my husband so they can play together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah and Jared

customer_reviews.title: Cool bow and arrow feel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool Nerf toy for kids. I bought it for my cousin's sin who's 9 and he loves it. It doesn't actually pull back the Nerf dart with the string and launch it, rather pulling the bow back locks the dart in place and letting it go launches it, simulating a bow and arrow.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works Half the Time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nerf-N-Strike StratoBow for my son and was very excited to receive it. However, it sometimes work and sometimes doesn't. At times it shoots maybe 6 out of the 15 darts we have. I purchased new darts to see if it was the bow or the darts and unfortunately it is the bow. Probably wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for our sons and one broke within 48 hours. The string got pulled out. My husband took the entire thing apart to try to fix it but now it wont shoot at all. I'm super disappointed and will be trying to exchage for a new one. The other 2 are fine but we are super bummed that one is broken already. I want to give these 5 stars because they are awesome but the fact that my small child was able to break it so fast was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: We only did one present this year so it had to be a good one. This was a huge hit
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our 8 year old. We only did one present this year so it had to be a good one. This was a huge hit. He loves it and has enjoyed playing with the neighborhood kids with it.
customer_reviews.author: MommaJen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my nephew in Hawaii and it was broken when he got it. Of course I offered to have it replaced but of course a kid doesn't want to give up his new toy, especially when his brother got a different style and they were ready to battle. So, he fixed it and carried on. Pretty disappointed that it was broken to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Does not fire
customer_reviews.text: We received the stratobow in great condition, however it doesn’t fire. We watched YouTube videos thinking we were using it wrong, but we were doing everything right. Then we went to the reviews only to see that some others received ones that don’t fire either. If you purchase this stratobow, be aware that it might not work!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: "I LOVE this bow
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our 7 year old grandson for his birthday. When he was getting ready for bed he looked at his gift and said, "I LOVE this bow!"
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Good value, better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Easter and is having so much fun with it. I'm surprised at how nice it is for what I paid. I think it's a really good value. It also shoots harder and farther than I was expecting, although not quite as good as some of his other nerfs. It's not as accurate either, but I think that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old approved!! Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This nerf bow is awesome! My soon to be 3 year old loves all things nerf but I am often left helping him with every fire as he isnt strong enough to cock the gun. This bow has no such problem. It is easy to pull back and release and manageable for his size. He loves running around calling himself Hawkeye while getting the bad guys. We will see how long it holds up but even for a short period the money is worth the joy.
customer_reviews.author: Punchie14

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a cool idea but doesn't work well at all. Not worth your time or money. It only shoots some of the bullets and when it does half of them only go about 1 foot. My son was so excited to have this and then equally disappointed. I thought he wasn't using it right but after I tried it out a few times quickly realized it is junk. When it works right it is a cool toy but the majority of the time it is a huge let down.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Beware string slapping
customer_reviews.text: Most important thing to know has been mentioned by others and that's the slapping of the string onto your arm as you fire. No way around it and it does get old. Otherwise this is a very fun toy and can shoot quite far.
customer_reviews.author: robunshaft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my son. This is one of his favorites.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Eight year old son received this for Christmas. It was a big hit! It’s a very sturdy toy and accurate shot, as well. The entire family has had fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money! I threw the packaging away as I ordered it for my son's bday present. It didn't shoot 1 dart before the string disconnected. I tried to fix it but there was no way. Ended up in the landfill & NO joy was had by it
customer_reviews.author: Abby dean

customer_reviews.title: Does not work AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 4th birthday. Can you just imagine the look on his little face, after he opens his present? So excited! But then we put it all together and it doesn't shoot! Now imagine the look on his poor face.DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT (unless you hate your children).
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a year and my son loves it. We never had an issue with it breaking. He's 5 and able to shoot it unlike some the other nerf products that are difficult to shoot. We got this one for my nephew for Christmas. It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Halbert

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fun. I bought 2 of these, one came broken, but we didn't find out until 5months later on Christmas morning. I called Nerf Customer service and they were very nice. Sent me a new one. Thank you. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: This gun is not a good product
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use, the gun broke. My dad opened it up and said the gun was a bad design. I will not be able to use it anymore. I highly recommend that you do not buy it !!!
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Yes - buy it
customer_reviews.text: Wow this baby has so range . It makes it all the way across the house . Easy enough for my three year old to use as all you have to do is pull the string back . Not too tight or slack.
customer_reviews.author: SailorMoon

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This toy is the worst piece of junk that I have bought in a long time. It was gifted to my daughter on her birthday, but upon first playing with it, the piece of plastic that holds the string broke. Fun idea but so cheaply made that it only fired one shot before breaking. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: QuirkyTurkey

customer_reviews.title: Young child
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a 4 year old and he loved it. Just found one when we cleaned porch from December when they were here.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Suppression fire
customer_reviews.text: Great for suppression fire. Not much for accuracy. But I love bows and Nerf so I had to get it. It's been a few months now and the string knot has already slipped out of the trigger mechanism. Now I'll need to open it up to reattach it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this thing. It's the right amount of effort to use. Great for anyone who needs an easy to use now.
customer_reviews.author: Walker3000

customer_reviews.title: An quality alternative to Nerf guns
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works is pretty much fun to use. It makes a nice gift. I find that kids go back to the standard nerf wheel guns after the novelty wears off. It’s not easy to run around and hide with a bow and arrow.
customer_reviews.author: davcall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little people
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my two grandchildren age 5 and 2 1/2 and they were both able to shoot them and load them on their own. Everybody has enjoyed them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hannemann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Nerf shooter!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this one, he's big on Nerf stuff this year to I added this to his arsenal and it's pretty fun! Easy to pull and shoots well, just about any kid can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Perticari

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend and we ended up having a Nerf fight after he opened it. It's the easiest Nerf weapon to load, shoots well and holds a good amount of darts. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeCicco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Playing hard with it & still in great condition -
customer_reviews.author: jmrzelda

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy to goof around with
customer_reviews.text: Is a very nice toy for anyone who likes anything bow powered. The clip is very easy to reload during battle which makes it even more fun and practical to use against your friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lucky Find
customer_reviews.text: I’d heard that the bows were having problems holding up but I guess I got one of the lucky ones. Used it in a friendly nerf war among friends and had no issues. It’s a pretty cool design though obviously not as accurate as one may want. Still presentation wise, did really well!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bullets do not reach 85ft
customer_reviews.text: Only 40% of the bullets can go beyond 80ft, the box says that the bullets can go 85ft.
customer_reviews.author: Trini Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My family has so much fun with this! The arrows don’t hurt. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Gimmicky and performs decently (sometimes)
customer_reviews.text: This bow is fun to use but sometimes the darts fart out or don't even fire. After breaking it in, it has gotten better. I'd say this blaster is gimmicky and is good for wars around the house
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very durable fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: It really works well and my 4 year old loves it. He has put it through a lot while "fighting zombies" and it holds up. He hasn't gotten bored with it in the months we've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Durable and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Nice accuracy when firing. 6 year old thinks he’s Rambo now. Kinda fun seeing him carry it around his shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: 4EVERME

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I work overnight on weekends. Once in awhile the Nerf guns come out if it gets quiet. I like this Nerf weapon. It’s cool, and the clip holds 15 rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Agent Provocateur

customer_reviews.title: It's the favorite over the guns in their stockpile@
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the quality of this toy. Most last for a week or two but this one is still going strong after 3 full months. It's the favorite over the guns in their stockpile@
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: No recoil, but a little snapback
customer_reviews.text: My nephew(6) wont use it as the orange piece you launch from snaps and hits his wrist when fired. As an adult I find no problem with it; just a light tap.
customer_reviews.author: joseph Mudge

customer_reviews.title: It is a lot of fun and works great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this . It is a lot of fun and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst nerf gun we own
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it, but the aim is a complete joke
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Defective or just false advertising.
customer_reviews.text: Just delivered today, kids were excited so was I. I decided to shoot first. Miss fire . Second try it went about 6 ft. Next time about 10. Aiming a little up. Waste of money . Half the time doesn’t shoot. Box says up to 85 ft...I would say max 15 with wind in your favor.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The bullets only go a couple feet if that.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: If you pull too aggressively on bowstring (teenage boys!), it doesn't for properly. This is disappointing for competitions. Overall a durable, well-made, and attractive product.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Principe

customer_reviews.title: Buy it , you’ll have fun
customer_reviews.text: Great and accurate, cool if you want to move your kids along into real archery at some point
customer_reviews.author: LUIS M.

customer_reviews.title: Item delivered to wrong addresd
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered to the wrong address. I have great neighbors which she brought to my house. It was a Christmas gift for my nephew and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Santa

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 6-year-old and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Batman81

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! This is excellent quality and easy for the kids to use. They loved it so much we ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great for 5 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 5 year old nephew. Be absolutely loves it! He can pull back and release it all by himself. Good quality too. Held up with drops as well on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Man Craft

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nerf Blaster. Fun, fast, shoots far.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER Nerf weapon. Shoots far, lots of fun. Easy to aim. Holds 15 darts. So far has been very reliable. First or 2nd weapon chosen from among about 2 dozen.
customer_reviews.author: Stickman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My kids have enjoyed playing with it. No problem with the package.
customer_reviews.author: Viri

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this place with it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within an hour by a small six year old who isn’t rough with toys.
customer_reviews.author: MAFAF

customer_reviews.title: Still overall happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Works well most of the time, but it has a lot of misfires too. Still overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: dany178

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this bow
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bow. It's the perfect size for my friends little brother. It shoots really well, and very far. I can't wait to give it as a birthday present!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Huge fans!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 4yo & 2yo, they love them! Easy to load & shoot. We have tons of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Dohrman

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old got this for his birthday and loved it. Very easy to load.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Candace

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Great for nerf fights at work.Shoots far and true. Just be careful of the bow string causing a burn on your arm. Easily solved by wearing long sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Kamixa

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and kids loved it. Unfortunately, it broke after just a few uses and we are passed the return date. Such a bummer :(
customer_reviews.author: SomeName

customer_reviews.title: Fun Bow for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nerf-N-Strike bow for my 5 year old son. It's super easy to use and durable. The auto loader works great and shoots around 15 darts. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Over all we like Nerf brand but maybe this design isn't their top ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it very long and already some of the dart slots don't seem to work. Over all we like Nerf brand but maybe this design isn't their top quality?
customer_reviews.author: Marriedwithtriplets

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for nerf battles at the local park
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for nerf battles at the local park. It shoots accurately and is something different from the nerf family.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: FUN, FUN, FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas was a riot with this toy! Got this for my grandson along with another bow for the other grandson! They went to the rec room and had a blast with them! FUN, FUN, FUN!!!
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaH

customer_reviews.title: the string hits your arm painfully when you firer it
customer_reviews.text: the string hits your arm painfully when you firer it and reel bows dont even do that
customer_reviews.author: Carrie McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first 5 minutes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The nerf bow was so awesome, it BROKE in the first 5 minutes of being played with. I would not buy this again. All the nerf guns work great, but this thing is junk! Would like another one, but I’m sure it would break just the same!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Parker

customer_reviews.title: Inspect your product and return ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Ordered product for birthday present. When child opened it, the product was broken. The worst part is I have a message showing that the return window timeframe passed. Apparently the window closed before the party ! Disappointed and won’t be ordering anymore toys for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My husband and my grandson are having fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Keeseman

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoyed it while it lasted. It broke very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Dow

customer_reviews.title: The Rubber String Can Not Be Replaced
customer_reviews.text: The rubber string is broken after half a year and is not replaceable, so I have to throw it away. It’s a toy anyway so it’s understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Already broken!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these for my boys ages 9 & 11. We’ve had it only a week & the string is already broken on one of them 😔 They only really used a few times so I was surprised. Super bummed to have wasted $30 on this. I hope the other one lasts longer!
customer_reviews.author: mix

customer_reviews.title: Works well and kids enjoying it.
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved these as gifts. Work really well and holding up so far to play.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my done who turned 7! He was so ecstatic when he opened the box. Perfect gift and still uses it daily.

customer_reviews.title: ... a little more work on this but it does pretty good at shooting most of all the darts
customer_reviews.text: Needs a little more work on this but it does pretty good at shooting most of all the darts. My daughter loves better than the rebel bow.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher m. Condon jr.

customer_reviews.title: The armory grows!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the arsenal! Purchased for my 4 y/o. He has no problem using it. String tension is soft enough for him to pull back with some effort. Decent fire power and accuracy. Instant favorite.
customer_reviews.author: patrick gray

customer_reviews.title: Nephew Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this for his nerf themed birthday party! It was just in a brown box and not in a nerf package.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Burton

customer_reviews.title: A defective article arrived.
customer_reviews.text: A dismantled deficient article arrived clearly once. Receiving it has a choice if I think about trouble of the return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anto

customer_reviews.title: Grandson and his buddies loved this addition to third Nerf weapon collection - they ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and his buddies loved this addition to third Nerf weapon collection - they have a blast outside playing with their Nerfs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing nerf bullets
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it, but it was not in original box, and was missing bullets, plus some of the plastic was damaged. Was going to return, but he likes playing with it. Product is good, but go with another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Franklin

customer_reviews.title: This bow is great for our 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: This bow is great for our 3 year old! He wants a bow like his daddy, and this is the best of both worlds - toy and gives him one like dad :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was shipped a used bow
customer_reviews.text: This is the second StratoBow I've purchased and I love it. However, I believe the one I received was a used one. I came to this conclusion because it wasn't shipped in the original packaging. Also, there were no tags on the bow. Finally, the drawstring also had some slack in it. So I'm not happy about it being used, but I do love the bow.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Sifuentes

customer_reviews.title: A bow and arrow set for nerf afficionados
customer_reviews.text: My grandson says this is very easy to handle compared to some of the larger models and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Burgin

customer_reviews.title: ) I like this Bow
customer_reviews.text: :) I like this Bow. Not to get too technical, its fun to use. Pair this up with suction darts instead of the regular darts that it comes with and every window or door pane becomes target practice. Kids and I love it. Our crayola whiteboard had gotten a new lease in life as the target for the suction darts shot through this bow in our yard!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amena S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible product! Ordered for nephew’s birthday he took it out of the box pulled the string back and it broke. Thinking it was defective I ordered a replacement and the exact same thing again. I would give it no stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toy.
customer_reviews.text: The bow is self loading with the pull back of the string. My son who is 8 years old loves this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiebaby

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING LIKE THE COMMERCIAL
customer_reviews.text: SHOOTS A SLOW LIMP 3-5FEET AND SLOWLY CURVES TO THE GROUND. NOTHING AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.author: gina4667

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying, my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My Son loves the bow. Its nice as it holds about 15 darts, and it auto loads them every time you pull the string to fire the next one, the orange part on the front cycles up every time you pull the string back - lining up the next dart. It has pretty good power too, can easily shoot the darts across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Paying Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is it really a Nerf?
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a gift and it arrived in unmarked packaging and looks like a Nerf knockoff. Not sure if I feel comfortable giving this as a gift. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Garvey

customer_reviews.title: stratabow vs guns
customer_reviews.text: i love this toy. Better than saying 'nerf gun', for a school aged kid that's not allowed to talk about guns in school.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year son loves it!!! All his friends love it. Been playing non stop with it

customer_reviews.title: Hit with Grandson!
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old grandson loves this! His parents did too.

customer_reviews.text: the bow string was not attached properly; my son-in-law had to spend an hour and a half figuring out how to take the whole thing apart and attach the bow string. seems to shoot ok, NOW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Decent nerf toy. Pretty cool works ok it does misfire occasionally.

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive what was included
customer_reviews.text: It said original packaging....Like new! Did not receive instructions or darts!

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old grandson very happy to fire at me (72 year old grandpa). Get extra ammo.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my 11 year old grandson was very happy, they can never have enough Nerf stuff

customer_reviews.title: Decent range and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this bow. Decent range and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: CrayolaDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I would like a refund. These nerf products stopped working after 2 weeks & minimal use. I ordered two & both are junk.

product_meta.title: Nerf N-Strike StratoBow Bow
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingTake aim with the real bow action of the high-capacity StratoBow dart-firing bow! This Nerf N-Strike bow has an integrated 15-dart clip that automatically indexes to the next dart. Fire 15 darts in a row without reloading, and send them blasting through the air up to 85 feet (26 meters). Pull the string back and release it to unleash a dart; the indexing clip will automatically ready the next dart for firing. Comes with 15 Elite darts. Deliver a message of domination with the high-capacity N-Strike StratoBow bow from Nerf! Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.

BRAND STORY
By Nerf
feature_bullets: Pull string back and release to fire darts
